content.text:
# King of the Circus

| runtime        = 18 episodes
| country        = United States
| language       = Silent (English intertitles)
}}
King of the Circus is a 1920 American action film serial directed by J. P. McGowan. The film is considered to be lost.
Cast
* Eddie Polo as Eddie King
* Corrine Porter as Helen Howard
* Kittoria Beveridge as Mary Warren
* Harry Madison as James Gray
* Charles Fortune as John Winters
* J. P. McGowan
* J.J. Bryson
* Dorothy Hagan
* Viola Tasma
* Tom London (as Leonard Clapham)
* Jay Marchant
* Frank Shaw
* Bruce Randall
* Jack Newton
Chapter titles
#Bloody Money
#The Mushroom Bullet
#Stolen Evidence
#Facing Death
#The Black Wallet
#The Lion's Claws
#Over the City
#Treachery
#Dynamite
#The Mystic Power (aka The Mystic's Power)
#Man and Beast
#Deep Waters
#A Fight for Life
#Out of the Clouds
#The Woman in Black
#The Cradle of Death
#The Final Reckoning
#The Lost Heritage
